name: Archer Watermelon Shoot
description:
Archer Watermelon Shoot is an addictive archery shooting game, where you get to shoot watermelons placed at different positions, with a bow and arrow, keeping the time in mind.

Key features
1. Amazing 3d graphics and engaging gameplay.
2. 40 levels to perform archery shooting.
3. Realistic watermelon breaking sound.
4. Addictive time management game.
5. Bow and arrow shooting game.
6. One of the best archery games and fruit shooting games.
7. 3d archery fruit shooting game for free.
